channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zakaria Zubeidi, Palestinian Militia and Theater Leader, Speaks After Release From Prison
item.description: Zakaria Zubeidi inspired Palestinians and horrified Israelis. Freed from jail during a recent truce, he questions what his many lives have achieved.

item.title: As Europe’s Heat Waves Intensify, France Bickers About Air-Conditioning
item.description: As heat waves batter Europe, the need (or not) for air-conditioning has become part of the political tug of war in France between the right and the le...

item.title: Trump’s ‘Law and Order’ Crackdown on D.C., and Silicon Valley Embraces the Pentagon
item.description: Plus, a quiet crisis for America’s jurors.

item.title: Foreign Recruits in Ukraine Military Are Killed in Russian Missile Strike
item.description: Russia has repeatedly targeted soldiers assembled at military academies, barracks and parade grounds.

item.title: Southeast Asia’s cities at ‘high risk’ of flooding and heatwaves, thanks to climate change
item.description: Bangkok, Jakarta, and Manila are among the cities facing at least a "high risk" of extreme rain and heatwaves, according to Zurich Resilience Solution...

item.title: How deals with Apple and Trump’s Pentagon turned rare earth miner MP Materials into a red-hot stock
item.description: MP Materials aims to build a U.S. rare-earths-and-magnets supply chain that can eventually compete with China.

item.title: What CEOs really think about Nvidia and AMD’s China export deal: ‘Brilliant, a tariff that we don’t have to pay’
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Israeli Hostage Families Call for General Strike Amid Plans for Gaza Offensive
item.description: Relatives of captives held by Hamas excoriated the Israeli government for what they called “an endless war without purpose.” It was unclear how many w...

item.title: A Glow Up Gone Awry
item.description: A restoration of a beloved figure of the Virgin Mary causes an uproar. “The Macarena cannot be made up!”

item.title: Foreign Recruits in Ukraine Military Are Killed in Russian Missile Strike
item.description: Russia has repeatedly targeted soldiers assembled at military academies, barracks and parade grounds.

item.title: Exclusive: Fintech giant Stripe building ‘Tempo’ blockchain with crypto VC Paradigm
item.description: Stripe’s newest push into crypto comes as the company has made an aggressive push into stablecoins.

item.title: Trump says Intel CEO has ‘amazing story,’ sets Cabinet talks
item.description: "Mr. Tan and my Cabinet members are going to spend time together, and bring suggestions to me during the next week."
